title: Chaos Fanatic

properties.name: description
properties.value:
The Chaos Fanatic is an insane mage that resides west of the Lava Maze. He is surrounded by unattackable miniature chaotic clouds, which serve as scenery. He drops one of three shards required to forge Odium wards and Malediction wards. He has a special attack where he uses a green magical attack that explodes and can deal high damage, similar to the Crazy Archaeologist's explosive book attack. Players must run away from them to avoid damage.
He is also able to disarm players, much like how the Chaos Elemental does. He is also one of the only monsters (including mummies, Vet'ion and the thermonuclear smoke devil) to drop the ancient staff.

Monster ID6619
The green magical attack players should avoid.

The Chaos Fanatic is an insane mage that resides west of the Lava Maze. He is surrounded by unattackable miniature chaotic clouds, which serve as scenery. He drops one of three shards required to forge Odium wards and Malediction wards. He has a special attack where he uses a green magical attack that explodes and can deal high damage, similar to the Crazy Archaeologist's explosive book attack. Players must run away from them to avoid damage. He is also able to disarm players, much like how the Chaos Elemental does. He is also one of the only monsters (including mummies, Vet'ion and the thermonuclear smoke devil) to drop the ancient staff.

Location[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Spawns Map
West of the Lava Maze2021Maplink

Getting there[edit | edit source]

The fastest way to get there is by casting Ghorrock Teleport or using its magic tablet equivalent. Alternatively, a burning amulet can teleport players to the entrance of the Lava Maze; run west from there. Alternately, players with the hard Wilderness Diary completed and a POH obelisk can select the level 44 Wilderness teleport.

Quotes[edit | edit source]

One quote is said every time the Chaos Fanatic attacks the player.

  • "Burn!"
  • "WEUGH!"
  • "Devilish Oxen Roll!"
  • "All your wilderness are belong to them!"
  • "AhehHeheuhHhahueHuUEehEahAH"
  • "I shall call him squidgy and he shall be my squidgy!"

The average Chaos Fanatic kill is worth 10,677.33.

The average Chaos Fanatic kill while on a Konar task is worth 12,131.36.

Combat Achievements[edit | edit source]

The following Combat Achievement tasks involve the Chaos Fanatic.

Name Description Difficulty Category
Chaos Fanatic Champion Kill the Chaos Fanatic 10 times. Medium Kill count
Sorry, What Was That? Kill the Chaos Fanatic without anyone being hit by his explosion attack. Medium Perfection
Chaos Fanatic Adept Kill the Chaos Fanatic 25 times. Hard Kill count
Praying to the Gods Kill the Chaos Fanatic 10 times without drinking any potion which restores prayer or leaving the Wilderness. Hard Restriction

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The Chaos Fanatic's animation (apart from attacking) is similar to Dr Harlow before he is sober.
  • The Chaos Fanatic's quote "I shall call him squidgy and he shall be my squidgy!" is a reference to the Pixar movie Finding Nemo.
  • The Chaos Fanatic's quote "All your wilderness are belong to them!" is a reference to the phrase "All your base are belong to us," which originated in the 1989 game Zero Wing and has made it into many games since then.
  • The Chaos Fanatic's quote "Devilish Oxen Roll!" is an anagram of "Lord Helix lives on!", in reference to Twitch Plays Pokémon.
